snippet: A report by Gretchen Morgenson in The Times this week provides more evidence that the playing field for stock investing is tilted against individual investors.
abstract: Editorial warns report in The New York Times provides more evidence that the playing field for stock investing is tilted against individual investors, with hedge funds trading on information that is unavailable to other investors; contends that unless the stock markets are restored to health with rules and protections that are clearly understood and enforced, individual investors have reason to be wary.
lead_paragraph: A report by Gretchen Morgenson in The Times this week provides more evidence that the playing field for stock investing is tilted against individual investors.
